name: mri_hausdorff_dist
author: FreeSurfer Developers
description: Tool for computing the mean or max of the minimum distances between point sets in 3D volumes.

inputs.description: Binarize input volumes with given threshold
inputs.name: Binarize Threshold

inputs.description: Read volumes from an input file (first argument is the input filename)
inputs.name: Input File Flag

inputs.description: Blur the input image with Gaussian of specified sigma
inputs.name: Gaussian Blur Sigma

inputs.description: Compute the maximum of the minimum distances instead of the mean
inputs.name: Max Distance Flag

inputs.description: Use specified label index as the target label
inputs.name: Label Index

output-files.description: Output text file containing the results of Hausdorff distance calculation
output-files.name: Output Text File
